about_the_game:
LIMINAL is a challenging first-person psychological horror. Explore endless procedural environments and discover their meaning. Find ways to survive and make sense of the world around you.


  • World Generation: Every aspect of the world is procedurally generated. Every playthrough will be unique and leave you with more questions than answers.
  • Survival: Food and water are necessary to survive. Fatigue and health must also be managed in order to remain alive.
  • Entities: You are not alone. It is within your best interest to avoid any and all entities if you wish to guarantee your survival.
  • Immersion: There is no traditional UI. All interfaces within the game are represented on physical objects. This adds another level of immersion to the experience.

  • Survival: Food and water are necessary to survive. Fatigue and health must also be managed in order to remain alive.
  • Entities: You are not alone. It is within your best interest to avoid any and all entities if you wish to guarantee your survival.
  • Immersion: There is no traditional UI. All interfaces within the game are represented on physical objects. This adds another level of immersion to the experience.
name: LIMINAL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX or Radeon RX5600 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: LIMINAL is a challenging first-person psychological horror. Explore endless procedural environments and discover their meaning. Find ways to survive and make sense of the world around you.
